pages.text: $(o)It seems that the End Crystal is capable of producing some sort of levitating effect in those nearby.$(p)While this is a kind of flight, we can do better.

$(o)There is another reaction with a similar, gravity-related effect. Find it and have it occur simultaneously with this one. They must both occur in the same Crucible. $(p)Only then will the true secret of $(item)Flight$(0) be revealed.
